WorkItem.Description:
I'm trying to create a custom skin with changeable faceplate color.
But it only turns out greyscale (or transparent in cutout mode), 
even when just selecting an unmodified skin from the source
(...\wabbit\WabbitStudio\Source\Wabbitemu\gui\ti-84+cse.png)

What am I doing wrong?
WorkItem.Summary: Custom skin with changeable faceplate colors
